lead_paragraph: The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs said Peter Jesper Dahlin, held this month on charges of violating security laws, had made “a full and frank confession.”
snippet: The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs said Peter Jesper Dahlin, held this month on charges of violating security laws, had made “a full and frank confession.”

headline.main: China to Expel Peter Dahlin, Swedish Human Rights Advocate
headline.print_headline: Chinese Say They’ll Expel a Swedish Rights Activist

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

abstract: Chinese officials will expel Swedish human rights activist Peter Jesper Dahlin, claiming he admitted to assisting criminal efforts harmful to Chinese national security; Western observers worry activist's televised confession was made under duress, and raise concerns over China's broader campaign against human rights advocacy.
